item.title: Learning Flask 01
item.description: learning Flask 01 Installation and configure of anaconda Installaltion homebrew 1 ruby -e "$ (curl - fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" Installation of pyenv 1 2 # Installing pyenv brew install pyenv Install anaconda 2 and anaconda 3 Download anaconda from here
